Articles.Content: Hey, was wondering if someone could make a scifi weapons packfor bdarmory?

I'm starting Work on one I'll start A thread for it soon.

Here is a video of a .cfg for a plasma cannon that I was trying out on the Browning, Because When I use a custom model for the weapon it drains all the Ammo without firing that is the issue in the second video.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXWdw-dV26Q

So now I'm trying to Isolate the issue So I can use the weapon models I've made.

I'm also going to do Missiles and bombs as for the turrets I have to wait until BD releases the New Turret Tutorial.

Cool! for me, when I asked for Scifi weapons for BD Armory, it is a blanket term to also include warship weapons.

- - - Updated - - -

That looks awesome, btw!
